titleInfo.title: Wall Painting, Hour Nine from 'Book of Gates', Tomb of Rameses VI

mods.abstract: Tomb of Rameses VI (New Kingdom - Dynasty XX) wall painting of the Hour Nine from 'Book of Gates'; ba bird souls (first register); deceased souls in the primeval waters of Nun (second register); "The Fiery One", the serpent called forth by Horus with his children standing in the coils (third register); a representation reminiscent of Hour Ten (fourth register); columns of hieroglyphs above each of the registers; untitled print, "579" in pencil on back of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
